ZachTutorial: ^Hey my name's Zach. Nice to meet you!
^Do you want to get straight to work?

c-0: ^Talk to Dawn on the desk left of yours. She'll have something for you to do.
^Good luck! It's going to be a slug.
c-1: ^Hell yea, let's play some games to pass the time!

ZachFirstMission: ^Do you want to be apart of a little secret project I have going on?

c-0: ^There's a red keycard on manager's desk in his office that I need you to grab.
^It's to the right of the elevator, you can't miss it dude.
^Once you're in his office and get near the keycard, press the "E" button on your keyboard.
^I'll meet you on the second floor after you get the card.

ZachDoTutorials: ^Make sure you go to Nico's office.
^Just follow the green floor upwards towards the elevator.
^It's to the right of the elevator, you can't miss it dude.
^Well I have to get back to "work".
